name: open-api-3-boilerplate
description: Boilerplate for API Specification, using Open API 3.0 & Swagger UI

scripts.dev:docker: docker stop api_spec || true && docker rm api_spec || true && docker run -d -p 8042:8080 --rm -e SWAGGER_JSON=/api_spec/swagger.json -v $PWD:/api_spec --name api_spec swaggerapi/swagger-ui

author: Adam Bradford <abradford@redventures.com>
